newsitem.title: USA: MDI Instruments gets FDA okay for ear fluid check.
newsitem.headline: MDI Instruments gets FDA okay for ear fluid check.

text.p: MDI Instruments Inc, a privately held maker of medical instruments, said on Wednesday that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration has given the company 51OK clearance to market its EarCheck Pro Otitis Media Detector.

MDI said the new instrument is designed to facilitate physicians' diagnosis of otitis media, or inflammation with or without infection of the middle ear, by confirming the presence of middle ear fluid.
